TITLE: Hello!
aboutme.intro1: Hi, I'm Markus. What excites me about programming is the opportunity to bring creative ideas to life through code.
aboutme.intro2: I'm especially fascinated by the logic behind it – how structured processes, clear rules, and flexible components come together to form thoughtful solutions. I enjoy working on both the frontend and backend, as I find it exciting to understand and shape a system as a whole – from the user interface to the data processing in the background. I see every new challenge as an opportunity to grow, continuously learn, and refine my skills.
aboutme.intro3: I draw inspiration from collaborating with others, engaging in exciting projects, and striving to solve real problems with elegant and efficient code.
aboutme.location: I currently live in Lauterach, Austria, but I’m open to modern ways of working. Remote work is no problem for me – on the contrary, it often allows for more focused work. Flexibility is, in my view, an essential part of being a developer.
aboutme.openminded: I’m very open to new technologies and consider lifelong learning a natural part of my profession. I’m motivated by working with current tools and frameworks, understanding new trends, and deepening my knowledge in a targeted way.
aboutme.problemsolving: My approach to problem-solving is analytical, creative, and solution-oriented. I break down complex tasks into manageable subproblems, view them from different perspectives, and then develop structured approaches to solve them. I rely on a mix of creativity, persistence, and collaboration. Every challenge is a learning opportunity for me – whether through new insights, team exchange, or finding particularly elegant solutions.
skills.intro1: I have extensive knowledge in web development – from creating static websites to building complex, modern web applications. I develop dynamic and responsive interfaces that adapt flexibly to different devices.
skills.intro2: I work confidently with REST APIs and databases to create interactive and data-driven applications. Through collaboration in various project teams, I have continuously improved my skills in collaborative development, version control, and structured workflows.
skills.subheadertext: Feel free to get in touch! I’m always looking to expand my knowledge.
